TopicTitle: do your found anomalies save across all of your games? ("anomaly detected" text not appearing)

Articles.Content: I started a new game (sandbox), and drove up to the monolith outside the KSC, and no "anomaly found" text appeared. I tried this with another anomaly I had found in another game, with the same result.

Anomalies don't save across games. Some anomalies are even in different places in different saves.

The anomaly found messages only show up in career mode, where you get some milestone funds for discovering them.

On 10/12/2021 at 10:36 AM, Stamp20 said:

The anomaly found messages only show up in career mode, where you get some milestone funds for discovering them.

Yes

The different anomalies across games are green monoliths that are found in some certain locations (I won't tell you tho where to find them )

Then there is black monoliths like the one you encountered at the KSC, then some special anomalies that are easter eggs or other ingame objects. Have fun!
